cause.description:
The Stratford Humane society has put out a plea for dog and cat food, they are running low, have 20 dogs and 70 cats right now. Bins are located at Sobey's and Zehr's in Stratford, so if you have a chance to pick up some extra pet food and donate, they would be very happy!
1. Feed the Animals
cause.name: Dog & Cat Food for Stratford Humane Society
